items.title: Rivian goes big on autonomy, with custom silicon, lidar, and a hint at robotaxis
items.summary: CEO RJ Scaringe laid out his plan for how Rivian's vehicles will increasingly drive themselves, in a bid to match or exceed the capabilities of rival automakers and AV companies.

items.title: Runway launches GWM-1, its first world model, which uses frame-by-frame prediction to simulate physics, and updates Gen 4.5 to add native audio and more (TechCrunch)
items.summary:
TechCrunch:
Runway launches GWM-1, its first world model, which uses frame-by-frame prediction to simulate physics, and updates Gen 4.5 to add native audio and more  —  The race to release world models is on as AI image and video generation company Runway joins an increasing number of startups and big tech companies by launching its first one.

items.title: Rivian is building its own powerful AI chips for autonomous driving
items.summary: Rivian announced that it was designing its own AI chips for fully autonomous driving, in a bold - if belated - move to catch up with Tesla and other automakers that have working on the technology for far longer. At an "AI and Autonomy" event at the company's office in Silicon Valley on Thursday, Rivian […]

items.title: Fill your favorite space with the beauty of the universe through Govee’s Matter Galaxy Light Star Projector 2 Pro at $160
items.summary:
By way of its official Amazon storefront, Govee is offering its new Galaxy Light Star Projector 2 Pro back at $159.99 shipped, after clipping the on-page $20 off coupon. Since it hit the market in late September, it’s mostly been keeping to its full $180 price tag, with only two discounts having been spotted previously – one to this same rate in late October and a fall to the $144 low back during Black Friday. If you missed out on that one-time Prime-exclusive low, you’re getting the next-best price here today with $20 savings.

items.title: Disney accuses Google of ‘massive’ copyright infringement following deal with OpenAI
items.summary: Disney has accused Google of engaging in copyright infringement on a "massive scale," claiming its AI models have generated images resembling characters from Frozen, Deadpool, Star Wars, and others, according to a report from Variety. In a cease-and-desist letter sent to Google on Wednesday, Disney demands that the tech giant stop allegedly infringing on its […]

items.title: Poland detains Russian archaeologist accused by Ukraine of stealing artefacts
items.summary: WARSAW, Dec 11 (Reuters) - Poland has detained a Russian archaeologist whom Ukraine accuses of unauthorised excavation and plundering historical artefacts in Crimea, Polish authorities said on Thursday, prompting outrage from Moscow which demanded his immediate release. Read full story

items.title: The OpenAI deal gives Disney a fair amount of oversight and control over how its IP is used, including a joint steering committee to monitor user creations (Axios)

The OpenAI deal gives Disney a fair amount of oversight and control over how its IP is used, including a joint steering committee to monitor user creations  —  Walt Disney has reached an agreement with OpenAI that will make the company the first major content licensing partner on Sora, OpenAI's social video platform.

It’s dropping down from its $210 full price, which we saw go as low as $150 in the first half of 2025, while the latter half has seen drops to $140, as well as the one-time previous fall to this same rate during Black Friday events two weeks ago. items.summary: ROME, Dec 11 (Reuters) - Italian police said on Thursday they had broken up an international criminal organisation that had swindled some 30 million euros ($35.2 million) from victims including the cultural body that manages Florence's artistic monuments. Read full story

items.title: German economy to grow 0.1 pct in 2025, dragged by U.S. tariffs
items.summary: BERLIN, Dec. 11 (Xinhua) -- Germany is facing a stronger-than-expected drag from U.S. tariff hikes, several leading research institutes said Thursday. They now project the economy to grow by only 0.1 percent in 2025, 0.1 percentage points lower than their autumn forecast. Read full story

Among the bunch, we spotted the latest Radster Trail Off-Road e-bike at $1,599 shipped, with its counterpart Radster Road Commuter e-bike also down at $1,599 shipped. Part of Rad’s new wave of e-mobility solutions, these e-bikes saw a permanent price cut from their original $2,199 MSRPs to $1,999 back in August, with discounts since having taken costs as low as $1,699 during Black Friday and Cyber Monday. What we love

You’re looking at a steering-wheel shell for Joy-Con 2 controllers that can magnetically snap on and turn your handheld into a wheel for racing games on Nintendo Switch 2. items.title: Sleek, smart, and simple: Hands-on with the Ecobee Smart Thermostat Premium
items.summary:
My wife and I recently moved into a new home, and it came with your standard, no-frills thermostat. In my case, A Honeywell Home ProSeries that has no wifi or smart features of any kind and is as boring-looking as you can get. It’s also not very intuitive, and programming it feels more tedious than it should.

Our previous home had an Ecobee thermostat that we really liked, but it was a much older (and now discontinued) model and not worth the trouble of removing and reinstalling at our new house. Knowing that we wanted another Ecobee, I thought it was be the perfect time to upgrade to Ecobee’s flagship model, the Smart Thermostat Premium.

more…

This is originally a $699 notebook that has lately been fetching $799, so you’re looking at a straight-up $220 discount on it right now. It hasn’t seen many discounts since its debut last year, and today’s deal lands it $20 below its previous all-time low and our mention from earlier this year. This is the lowest price we have tracked for it to date, so now’s the time to jump in and snag this model if you were planning to pick up a touchscreen 2-in-1 Chromebook for everyday use. Head below for more details.
